duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct or indirect patient care in accordance with treatment plans as determined/delegated by a licensed nurse.
Assist with tasks necessary for the general management and organization of the patient care unit.
Assist with admission, discharge, and transfer of patients.
Ensure equipment and facilities are clean and stocked with appropriate supplies.

education_certification.credential: Nursing Fundamentals, Certified Nursing Assistant (CNA) certification -OR- one (1) year experience as a medical assistant/technician in a health-related facility
